Summary: Alternating red and orange lights; pod in the sky jumping around from place to place
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Dexter
There were no other sightings in Dexter on or around September 29th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the telephone with my girlfriend chatting while laying down in my bed looking up through my sunroof, when I noticed what appeared to be a fighter jet or some sort of aircraft until I was able to tell that the lights seemed to be jumping around and making movements that are clearly impossible to perform with the current technology that we have. I first noticed the object as I was just looking up at the sky and saw the unusual light patterns and the jerky movements that the craft seemed to be making around the sky and then it disappeared behind the treeline. I didn't feel any different in my actions and reactions during the sighting other than nervousness and curiousity as to where this object may be headed or what it is in general.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
